actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To improve choices for consumers for vehicles, and for other purposes.
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text: Consumer Vehicle Choice Act of 2010 - Requires each manufacturer to ensure that at least 50% of 2011 and 2012 model year automobiles and light duty trucks manufactured for sale in the United States are dual fueled. Increases the minimum to 90% for later model years. (Excludes automobiles and light duty trucks that operate only on electricity.)

titles.title: To improve choices for consumers for vehicles, and for other purposes.
